Setup SpotLy

Let's connect your Spotify account in 3 easy steps

1
Create Spotify App

First, you need to create a Spotify Developer app to get API credentials.

  1. Click the button above to open Spotify Developer Dashboard
  2. Log in with your Spotify account
  3. Click "Create App"
  4. Give it any name (e.g., "SpotLy")
  5. Add a description (optional)
  6. Click "Create"
2
Add Redirect URI

In your Spotify app settings, add this Redirect URI:

http://127.0.0.1:8080/callback üìã
  1. In your Spotify app, click "Edit Settings"
  2. Find the "Redirect URIs" section
  3. Click the copy button above to copy the URI
  4. Paste it into the Redirect URIs field
  5. Click "Add"
  6. Click "Save" at the bottom
3
Enter Credentials

Copy your Client ID and Client Secret from Spotify and paste them here:

Found in your Spotify app's "Basic Information" section
Click "View client secret" in Spotify, then copy it

Your credentials are stored securely on your computer only.
